snippet: The Canadian Svein Tuft powered Orica Green-Edge to victory in the team time trial in Belfast, Northern Ireland, in the opening stage of the Giro d’Italia, taking the overall leader’s pink jersey.
abstract: Canadian bicyclist Svein Tuft leads team to overall lead in the opening stage of the Giro D'Italia.
lead_paragraph: The Canadian Svein Tuft powered Orica Green-Edge to victory in the team time trial in Belfast, Northern Ireland, in the opening stage of the Giro d’Italia, taking the overall leader’s pink jersey.

headline.main: Canadian Takes Lead in Giro d’Italia
headline.print_headline: Canadian Takes Lead in Giro d’Italia
